description:
"""There's no other woman I could love more than you."" 
You're off on your grand world tour! However, you meet a mysterious officer on the ship who seems to have a close connection to Soryu. It's been plain sailing on this pre-wedding cruise, but the seas are about to turn rough as jealousy and insecurity whirl you into a blood-stained love triangle...!"
name: Engagement Cruise: Soryu
